Title: Rumors of the Jeweled Whelplings
RewardText: Have you heard the tale of this ancient jewelcrafter from the Dragon Isles? Legend has it they had a technique to craft jeweled whelpling statues that would come to life. I took it for just a story as well, but then this map was found in the pack of one of our fallen scouts with a clue to a jeweled whelpling. Take the map, see if it leads to the secret of creating these fabled living statues.
